fields.name: src
fields.label: URL
fields.description: This is used for videos we embed, such as YouTube embed links.

fields.name: isReversed
fields.label: Is Text on the Right?
fields.description: When toggled, the media and text content will be swapped.

fields.label: Read (time) length

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
